name: interlinked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
joined or connected together, with the parts that are joined often having an effect on each other: The circuits are interlinked with each other and the main power supply. It's clear that unemployment and crime are interlinked. See
interlink
More examplesFewer examplesThe global investment market is more tightly interlinked than ever before.The power grids in the area are all interlinked.This is a book of interlinked stories.
